Talk_14: <sp:3:0:2:0800>It's cooked to perfection now. Try it!
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Looks like it won't fit in your pouch. Free
up some space and bug me again.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to Bedrock Bistro, where we
satiate the insatiable!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>This is when the flavors really get
rolling. Dee-lish.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>If you're that interested in Mr. Gomo,
he's out in front of the restaurant.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>When the marbled rock roast showed
up on the scene, I was downright coarse
to him.
So I've kinda been avoiding him
altogether...

I'm hoping to find some <clr:0000>ripened flint<clr:ffff>
to offer him, by way of apology.
It's his favorite.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Rock roast<clr:ffff> is in short supply, as usual.


There are some in the caves around here,
but the footholds collapsed, and they
can't keep a steady supply coming.
So if you find some, please bring it to me.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>That marbled rock roast isn't for sale!


Pesky little Hylian.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome to Bedrock Bistro, a favorite
among even the most selective foodies.
Like our esteemed Mr. Gomo!
Com_Talk_13: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>How many would you like to sell?
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Whoa there! You know I can't buy clothes
you're wearing!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The food for Hylians is prepared with less
crunch, more give.

You can order anything you like right from
the grill.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Gomo the goromand is a very special
guest here at the bistro.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I heard about the whole mess with us
Gorons recently, and, well, I feel plain
awful about it.
<snd:Think>I think it started once the marbled rock
roast showed up, but I don't remember
too well...
All I can do now is try to smooth things
over by preparing Mr. Gomo's favoriteâ€”
<clr:0000>ripened<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>flint<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But it's hard to come by...
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM>That's still cooking on the flame!
It's pipin' hot!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Eating>Tasting food is part of a chef's grand
work, ya know. So until I'm done tasting
this here marbled rock roast...
the joint's closed! That includes anything
on the Hylian menu.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Thanks to you, our Hylian menu is sold
out as well.

I'll stock up again soon, and I'll make sure
it's cooked to perfection.
